## :warning: Code Scanning Alert Introduced
A code scanning alert has been detected on this branch by CodeQL.

|   |   |
| - | - |
| **Rule:** | java/sql-injection |
| **Severity:** | error |
| **Description:** | Query built from user-controlled sources |

[View full details](https://github.com/Codertocat/Hello-World/security/code-scanning/10)
